description.value:
Your connection to this divine domain ensures you always have certain spells ready. When you reach a Cleric level specified in the War Domain Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

War Domain Spells
Cleric LevelSpells
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGuidingBol]{Guiding Bolt}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplMagicWeapo]{Magic Weapon}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplShieldOfFa]{Shield of Faith}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSpiritualW]{Spiritual Weapon}
5th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCrusadersM]{Crusader's Mantle}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSpiritGuar]{Spirit Guardians}
7th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplFireShield]{Fire Shield}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplFreedomOfM]{Freedom of Movement}
9th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplHoldMonste]{Hold Monster}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSteelWindS]{Steel Wind Strike}
